c1-s2.ipa: ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː jyak kɨ̀j kʰị̌ː jiáː .
c1-s2.tupa: sryoq jyq jwiaek kyj khyih jiaeq

c1-s4.ipa: ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː də̌j ɲìn lɨk jiáː .
c1-s4.tupa: sryoq jyq deojh njin lyk jiaeq

c1-s5.ipa: ɲièn kɨ̀j kʰị̌ː ʨɨ̀ː lɨk jiáː kʷɑ́ŋ .
c1-s5.tupa: njien kyj khyih tjy lyk jiaeq kwangq

c1-s8.ipa: kǒː ɦʉúː ʈiěː ʨiáː ʥǐn mʉùː ɦʉón lɨə̌ː .
c1-s8.tupa: koh uq trieh tjiaeq djinh mu uonq lyoh

c1-s14.ipa: nə́j nə̀ŋ ɦỵèː ɲìn ʂɨə́ː ʂɨ́ː .
c1-s14.tupa: neojq neong ue njin sryoq sryq

c1-s17.ipa: gɨ̀ː jʉǒŋ kʰɨ́j ʨɨ́ː mʉǒn tʷɑ̀n .
c1-s17.tupa: gy juongh khyjq tjyq muonh twan

c1-s22.ipa: ɦɑ̀ː nə̀ŋ ɦỵèː ɲɨ̀ː nə̀ŋ ɕɨk ɲìn ʨɨ̀ː ŋɨə́ː .
c1-s22.tupa: gha neong ue njy neong sjyk njin tjy ngyoq

c1-s23.ipa: ɲɨ̀ː ɦỵèː ɲìn ʨɨ̀ː ʂɨ́ː jiàː .
c1-s23.tupa: njy ue njin tjy sryq jiae

c1-s25.ipa: ʦʰiéː ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː ɦʉúː pèn ɖiàŋ ŋɨə́ː ŋɨə̀n jiáː .
c1-s25.tupa: tshieq sryoq jyq uq pen driaeng ngyoq ngyon jiaeq

c1-s29.ipa: kɨ̀j kʰị̌ː kǒː pʉùː nə̀ŋ ɦẹ́ː .
c1-s29.tupa: kyj khyih koh pu neong gheeq

c1-s30.ipa: ɲièn kɨ̀j kʰị̌ː ʂɨə́ː ɦẹ́ː ʨiáː .
c1-s30.tupa: njien kyj khyih sryoq gheeq tjiaeq

c1-s31.ipa: ʦək lèw lèw ɲièn ɲǐː sɑ̀m ŋɨə̀n jiáː .
c1-s31.tupa: tseok lew lew njien njih sam ngyon jiaeq

c1-s35.ipa: ʦʰiéː kẹ̀j ʨǐː ŋʉòn ʨɨ̀ː zɨ̀ː .
c1-s35.tupa: tshieq keej tjih nguon tjy zy

c1-s36.ipa: ɲìn ɦʉǔː mʉ̌j jiěː jʉǒŋ ʨɨ̀ː .
c1-s36.tupa: njin uh mujh jieh juongh tjy

c1-s37.ipa: kǒː ʦʰʉóː gɨ̀ː ʈʉùŋ jʉòŋ ʨɨ̀ː dɑ́w .
c1-s37.tupa: koh tshuoq gy trung juong tjy dawq

c1-s39.ipa: ʦʰʉóː gɨ̀ː ʦiàŋ lěn mịàŋ ʔiěw ʨiáː .
c1-s39.tupa: tshuoq gy tsiaeng lenh myaeng qiewh tjiaeq

c1-s42.ipa: ʥɨɑ̌ŋ ʦʉok kʷɑ̀n ʨɨ̀ː ɲɨ̀ː ɦỵèː ɲìn ʨɨ̀ː jʉǒŋ .
c1-s42.tupa: djyangh tsuok kwan tjy njy ue njin tjy juongh

c1-s43.source: 下足譯之而為機器所解。
c1-s43.ipa: ɦạ́ː ʦʉok jiak ʨɨ̀ː ɲɨ̀ː ɦỵèː kɨ̀j kʰị̌ː ʂɨə́ː ɦẹ́ː .
c1-s43.tupa: ghaeq tsuok jiaek tjy njy ue kyj khyih sryoq gheeq

c1-s44.ipa: ʥiéː ɦʉ̌j pèn ɖiàŋ ŋɨə́ː ŋɨə̀n jiáː .
c1-s44.tupa: djieq ujh pen driaeng ngyoq ngyon jiaeq

c1-s50.ipa: ɖiàŋ ɕɨk ʂɨə́ː kʉ̌j ʨiáː ɦɑ̀ː .
c1-s50.tupa: driaeng sjyk sryoq kujh tjiaeq gha

c1-s56.ipa: ɲièn ɦʷək ꭦɨ̌ː bój ɲɨ̀ː kùŋ pɑ̌n .
c1-s56.tupa: njien ghweok dzryh bojq njy koung panh

c1-s57.ipa: ɦʷək dɑ́w ɦʉòː ɲɨ̀ː gʉùː ɦʉón .
c1-s57.tupa: ghweok dawq uo njy gu uonq

c1-s65.ipa: ɦʉǔː ɖiàŋ ɕɨk ɲɨə̀ː mʉ̀n ʨɨɑ̀ŋ ɲièn .
c1-s65.tupa: uh driaeng sjyk njyo mun tjyang njien

c1-s66.ipa: ɲɨə̀ː gɨ̀ː sǐn pịt ʣəp ʦʰǔː ʨiáː .
c1-s66.tupa: njyo gy sinh pyit dzeop tshouh tjiaeq

c1-s67.ipa: gɨ̀ː ŋịěː jiak pit pʉùː tʰùŋ .
c1-s67.tupa: gy ngyeh jiaek pit pu thoung

c1-s68.ipa: gɨ̀ː mị̌w jiak pit tɑ̀ː ɦɨ́ː .
c1-s68.tupa: gy myiwh jiaek pit ta yq

c1-s72.ipa: liàŋ ɲìn duk ʨɨ̀ː ɲɨ̀ː dɑt gɨ̀ː ʔɨ̌ː .
c1-s72.tupa: liaeng njin douk tjy njy dat gy qyh

c1-s73.ipa: kɨ̀j kʰị̌ː ɦạ̀ŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɲɨ̀ː mʉòː ɕiéw ɕit .
c1-s73.tupa: kyj khyih ghaeng tjy njy muo sjiewq sjit

c1-s76.ipa: kʉ̀n ŋɨə̀n pèn ɖiàŋ jiak mị́ː ɦɨ́ː .
c1-s76.tupa: kun ngyon pen driaeng jiaek myiq yq

c1-s77.ipa: ɲièn ŋòː kɨ̌j pʉùː jɨ́ː gɨ̀ː ɦỵèː ʂịàŋ kěj .
c1-s77.tupa: njien ngo kyjh pu jyq gy ue sryaeng kejh

c1-s78.ipa: hɑ̌w ʨɨ̀ː ʨiáː ʣǐː mʉùː ʨɨ̀ː .
c1-s78.tupa: hawh tjy tjiaeq dzih mu tjy

c1-s82.ipa: ɦọk ʨɨ̀ː jiak ɦʉúː ʔiak ʔɨə̀ː sɨ̀ː .
c1-s82.tupa: ghoeuk tjy jiaek uq qiaek qyo sy

c1-s89.ipa: pèn ɖiàŋ bʉǔː ɦɑ̀ː lɑk jiàː .
c1-s89.tupa: pen driaeng buh gha lak jiae

c1-s93.source: 何如鬥雞走犬呼盧傳杯之樂歟。
c1-s93.ipa: ɦɑ̀ː ɲɨə̀ː tǔː kèj ʦúː kʰʷén hòː lòː ɖyèn pòj ʨɨ̀ː lɑk jɨə̀ː .
c1-s93.tupa: gha njyo touh kej tsouq khwenq ho lo drwien poj tjy lak jyo

c1-s97.ipa: ɳɨə́ː kʷẹ̀ː ʥiéː ꭧʰɨə̀ː ʈièː ʨɨ̀ː .
c1-s97.tupa: nryoq kwee djieq tshryo trie tjy

c1-s98.ipa: kùŋ ɕʉòː ʦɨ́ː bʉǔː ʈièː ʨɨ̀ː .
c1-s98.tupa: koung sjuo tsyq buh trie tjy

c1-s99.ipa: ʔùː jiáː ʦɨ́ː sɑ̀m ʈièː ʨɨ̀ː .
c1-s99.tupa: qou jiaeq tsyq sam trie tjy

c1-s105.ipa: ŋòː ʈièː pèn ɖiàŋ ʨɨ̀ː ʔiak jiáː .
c1-s105.tupa: ngo trie pen driaeng tjy qiaek jiaeq

c1-s106.ipa: ɲièn mʉòː jʉùː ɲɨ̀ː ɦọk ʨɨ̀ː .
c1-s106.tupa: njien muo ju njy ghoeuk tjy

c1-s112.ipa: kǒː gɨ̀ː jʉǒŋ ʣɨ̌ː pit jiak ɲɨ́ː .
c1-s112.tupa: koh gy juongh dzyh pit jiaek njyq

c1-s113.ipa: gɨ̀ː zɨ̀ː kóː tɑ̀ː mʉ̌j mʉ̀n .
c1-s113.tupa: gy zy koq ta mujh mun

c1-s116.ipa: kǒː ɦʉot mʉ̌j ŋɨə̀n gɨ̀ː pèn ɖiàŋ .
c1-s116.tupa: koh uot mujh ngyon gy pen driaeng

c1-s118.ipa: siak zɨə̀ː lǐː ʨɨ̀ː jiak kɨ́j ɦɑ̀ː ŋʉòn pón .
c1-s118.tupa: siaek zyo lih tjy jiaek kyjq gha nguon ponq

c1-s119.ipa: sèn kẹ́ː kɨ́j ɦɑ̀ː ʨɨ̀ː jʉǒŋ ʣɨ̌ː .
c1-s119.tupa: sen keeq kyjq gha tjy juongh dzyh

c1-s121.source: 必不能效抱朴之河車朱雀。
c1-s121.ipa: pit pʉùː nə̀ŋ ɦạ̌w bɑ́w pʰọk ʨɨ̀ː ɦɑ̀ː ʨʰiàː ʨʉòː ʦɨɑk .
c1-s121.tupa: pit pu neong ghaewh bawq phoeuk tjy gha tjhiae tjuo tsyak

c1-s122.ipa: nə́j ʂɨ́ː kʷɑ̀n ʨiáː pʉùː ʈièː ʂɨə́ː ɦʉ̀n .
c1-s122.tupa: neojq sryq kwan tjiaeq pu trie sryoq un

c1-s125.ipa: ɖiàŋ ɕɨk ʨɨ̀ː mʉ̀n ʣɨ̌ː jiáː .
c1-s125.tupa: driaeng sjyk tjy mun dzyh jiaeq

c1-s131.ipa: ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː jiak pèn ɖiàŋ ŋɨə́ː ŋɨə̀n .
c1-s131.tupa: sryoq jyq jiaek pen driaeng ngyoq ngyon

c1-s132.ipa: liàŋ gɨ̀ː ɦỵèː kɨ̀j kʰị̌ː ʨɨ̀ː ʂɨə́ː ɦẹ́ː jiáː .
c1-s132.tupa: liaeng gy ue kyj khyih tjy sryoq gheeq jiaeq

c1-s134.ipa: gɨ̀ː ɖiàŋ ɕɨk kɨ̌j ɦỵèː kɨ̀j kʰị̌ː ʂɨə́ː ɦẹ́ː .
c1-s134.tupa: gy driaeng sjyk kyjh ue kyj khyih sryoq gheeq

c1-s142.ipa: kɨ̀j kʰị̌ː pʉùː nə̀ŋ dɑt ɲìn ʂɨə́ː jʉok .
c1-s142.tupa: kyj khyih pu neong dat njin sryoq juok

c1-s143.ipa: ʥiéː jɨ́ː gɨ̀ː ʔìn kok ɲìn jiáː .
c1-s143.tupa: djieq jyq gy qin kok njin jiaeq

c1-s144.source: 今世之編程語言豈下百種。
c1-s144.ipa: kị̀m ɕiěj ʨɨ̀ː pèn ɖiàŋ ŋɨə́ː ŋɨə̀n kʰɨ́j ɦạ̌ː pạk ʨʉóŋ .
c1-s144.tupa: kyim sjiejh tjy pen driaeng ngyoq ngyon khyjq ghaeh paek tjuongq

c1-s145.ipa: kɑk ꭧẹ̀ŋ ʔit ɲit ʨɨ̀ː ʈɨɑ́ŋ .
c1-s145.tupa: kak tsreeng qit njit tjy tryangq

c1-s146.ipa: ɲièn tɑ̀ː sèj ɲìn ʂɨə́ː ʨiěj .
c1-s146.tupa: njien ta sej njin sryoq tjiejh

c1-s147.ipa: jiak jyèn sèj ɲìn ʨɨ̀ː ŋɨə́ː .
c1-s147.tupa: jiaek jwien sej njin tjy ngyoq

c1-s148.ipa: kị̀m ɦʉúː ɦóː ʥɨɑ̌ŋ ɦʷɑ̀ŋ ʂịàŋ .
c1-s148.tupa: kyim uq ghoq djyangh ghwang sryaeng

c1-s150.ipa: ɦạ̌w kóː ɲìn ʨɨ̀ː ŋạ́ː ŋɨə̀n .
c1-s150.tupa: ghaewh koq njin tjy ngaeq ngyon

c1-s151.ipa: ɦỵěː hɑ̌n ŋɨə́ː ʦɑk pèn ɖiàŋ ʨɨ̀ː kěj .
c1-s151.tupa: ueh hanh ngyoq tsak pen driaeng tjy kejh

c1-s152.ipa: miàŋ gɨ̀ː ŋɨə̀n ɦʉot mʉ̀n ŋɨə̀n .
c1-s152.tupa: miaeng gy ngyon uot mun ngyon

c1-s156.ipa: mʉòː pʉùː jɨ́ː ʦʷɑ̌j jiěː ɕɨ́ː .
c1-s156.tupa: muo pu jyq tswajh jieh sjyq

c1-s157.ipa: siak lʉòŋ mʉ̀n sɑ̀m ʣɨ̌ː ʥiéː jiáː .
c1-s157.tupa: siaek luong mun sam dzyh djieq jiaeq

c1-s159.ipa: pèn ɖiàŋ ʨɨ̀ː ʦʷɑ̌j jiěː ʨiáː .
c1-s159.tupa: pen driaeng tjy tswajh jieh tjiaeq

c1-s160.ipa: ɦʉot mʉ̌n tʰèn dǐː hɑ́w ʣə́j .
c1-s160.tupa: uot munh then dih hawq dzeojq

c1-s161.ipa: liet gɨ̀ː də̌j mạ́ː ɲɨə̀ː ʦɑ́ː .
c1-s161.tupa: liet gy deojh maeq njyo tsaq

c1-s167.ipa: ɦʉot mʉ̌n tʰèn dǐː hɑ́w ʣə́j .
c1-s167.tupa: uot munh then dih hawq dzeojq

c1-s171.ipa: nə́j tək mʉ̌n tʰèn dǐː hɑ́w ʣə́j .
c1-s171.tupa: neojq teok munh then dih hawq dzeojq

c1-s175.ipa: ɦòː ɦʉot mʉ̌n tʰèn dǐː hɑ́w ʣə́j jiàː .
c1-s175.tupa: gho uot munh then dih hawq dzeojq jiae

c1-s177.ipa: kɑ̌j kɨ̀j kʰị̌ː mʉ̌j pèn ɖiàŋ ʥɨ̀ː .
c1-s177.tupa: kajh kyj khyih mujh pen driaeng djy

c1-s179.ipa: pʉùː ʈièː tʰèn dǐː ʨɨ̀ː ʂɨə́ː ʣə́j .
c1-s179.tupa: pu trie then dih tjy sryoq dzeojq

c1-s183.ipa: kǒː jʉok mʉ̌n tʰèn dǐː ʨɨ̀ː hɑ́w ʣə́j jiáː .
c1-s183.tupa: koh juok munh then dih tjy hawq dzeojq jiaeq

c1-s185.ipa: ɦòː mʉ̌n ʨɨ̀ː sɑ̀m pěn jiàː .
c1-s185.tupa: gho munh tjy sam penh jiae

c1-s186.ipa: tʰèn dǐː kʰɨ́j lùŋ jiáː ʦə̀j .
c1-s186.tupa: then dih khyjq loung jiaeq tseoj

c1-s187.ipa: kʉ̀n pʉùː mʉ̀n ʣìn mit ʨɨ̀ː bịén jiàː .
c1-s187.tupa: kun pu mun dzin mit tjy byenq jiae

c1-s190.ipa: ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː ʑǐː zʷìn ɦʷạ̀n ʨɨ̀ː jʉǒŋ jiáː .
c1-s190.tupa: sryoq jyq zjih zwin ghwaen tjy juongh jiaeq

c1-s192.ipa: ɦỵèː ʔit ꭦɨ̌ː ʂọk pěn jiáː .
c1-s192.tupa: ue qit dzryh sroeuk penh jiaeq

c1-s193.ipa: ɲɨə̀ː pʉuk ʦʰǔː lʷìn ʈyěn ɲièn .
c1-s193.tupa: njyo puk tshouh lwin trwienh njien

c1-s194.ipa: ɲɨə̀ː ɲit ŋʉot kạ̀w tʰěj ɲièn .
c1-s194.tupa: njyo njit nguot kaew thejh njien

c1-s204.ipa: ɦʉot mʉ̌n tʰèn dǐː hɑ́w ʣə́j .
c1-s204.tupa: uot munh then dih hawq dzeojq

c1-s209.ipa: ɦʉot mʉ̌n tʰèn dǐː hɑ́w ʣə́j .
c1-s209.tupa: uot munh then dih hawq dzeojq

c1-s231.ipa: ɦʉot mʉ̌n tʰèn dǐː hɑ́w ʣə́j .
c1-s231.tupa: uot munh then dih hawq dzeojq

c1-s233.ipa: ŋòː ɦʉúː ʔit ʂʉǒː ŋòː ɦʉúː ʔit ŋɨə̀n ʨiáː .
c1-s233.tupa: ngo uq qit sruoh ngo uq qit ngyon tjiaeq

c1-s234.ipa: kɑ̌j ŋɨə̀n ʥiéː pịěn ʂʉǒː ʨɨ̀ː lʷǐː jiáː .
c1-s234.tupa: kajh ngyon djieq pyenh sruoh tjy lwih jiaeq

c1-s241.ipa: jʉùː mạ́ː ʨɨ̀ː pʉùː dùŋ ʔɨə̀ː luk .
c1-s241.tupa: ju maeq tjy pu doung qyo louk

c1-s242.ipa: ɲìn ʨɨ̀ː pʉùː dùŋ ʔɨə̀ː kʉ́j .
c1-s242.tupa: njin tjy pu doung qyo kujq

c1-s245.ipa: ɦʉot sɑ̀m ɦʉot mʉ̌n tʰèn dǐː hɑ́w ʣə́j .
c1-s245.tupa: uot sam uot munh then dih hawq dzeojq

c1-s247.ipa: ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː mịǎŋ gɨ̀ː ʑit jiáː .
c1-s247.tupa: sryoq jyq myaengh gy zjit jiaeq

c1-s248.ipa: ɦúː ɲɨɑk ɦʉúː mʉ̌n ʂʉǒː kɨ́j ɦɑ̀ː ʨiáː .
c1-s248.tupa: ghouq njyak uq munh sruoh kyjq gha tjiaeq

c1-s249.ipa: nə́j ʣǐː ʥiéː ʈièː gɨ̀ː ɦỵèː sɑ̀m .
c1-s249.tupa: neojq dzih djieq trie gy ue sam

c1-s252.ipa: ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː miàŋ pịěn ʂʉǒː jiáː .
c1-s252.tupa: sryoq jyq miaeng pyenh sruoh jiaeq

c1-s253.ipa: ɲɨə̀ː ɲìn ʨɨ̀ː miàŋ ʦɑ̀ŋ ɦʷẹk .
c1-s253.tupa: njyo njin tjy miaeng tsang ghweek

c1-s255.ipa: ɦúː bʉòm ɦʉot ʦɑ̀ŋ ɦʷẹk ʨiáː .
c1-s255.tupa: ghouq buom uot tsang ghweek tjiaeq

c1-s256.ipa: nə́j ʈièː ɦʉ̌j ʦɑ̀ŋ ɦʷẹk gɨ̀ː ɲìn .
c1-s256.tupa: neojq trie ujh tsang ghweek gy njin

c1-s257.ipa: ɦʉǔː mʉǒn mʉt kẹ̀j pịěn hʷạ̌ː ʨɨ̀ː ʈʉùŋ .
c1-s257.tupa: uh muonh mut keej pyenh hwaeh tjy trung

c1-s258.ipa: ɲɨə̀ː siak ɲìn ʨɨ̀ː kʷɑ́ŋ lɨ̀ŋ .
c1-s258.tupa: njyo siaek njin tjy kwangq lyng

c1-s259.ipa: bạ́w ʨiěw ʨɨ̀ː mʉòː ʥiàŋ jiáː .
c1-s259.tupa: baewq tjiewh tjy muo djiaeng jiaeq

c1-s260.ipa: kị̀m jiak kạp ɦỵèː sǐː ɲɨə̀ː ʥiéː .
c1-s260.tupa: kyim jiaek kaep ue sih njyo djieq

c1-s264.ipa: kɑ̌j pịéː ɦʉ̌n ɦạ̀ŋ ʨɨ̀ː ʂɨə́ː tək .
c1-s264.tupa: kajh pyeq unh ghaeng tjy sryoq teok

c1-s266.ipa: ɲɨ̀ː ɲìn mʉòː jʉùː ɲɨ̀ː ʈièː ʨɨ̀ː .
c1-s266.tupa: njy njin muo ju njy trie tjy

c1-s267.source: 故用此辭令其示人以果也。
c1-s267.ipa: kǒː jʉǒŋ ʦʰiéː zɨ̀ː liàŋ gɨ̀ː ʑǐː ɲìn jɨ́ː kʷɑ́ː jiáː .
c1-s267.tupa: koh juongh tshieq zy liaeng gy zjih njin jyq kwaq jiaeq

c1-s269.source: 甲字上下有符如矩尺然者。
c1-s269.ipa: kạp ʣɨ̌ː ʥɨɑ̌ŋ ɦạ́ː ɦʉúː bʉòː ɲɨə̀ː kʉóː ʨʰiak ɲièn ʨiáː .
c1-s269.tupa: kaep dzyh djyangh ghaeq uq buo njyo kuoq tjhiaek njien tjiaeq

c1-s277.ipa: ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː pịet pịěn ʂʉǒː ʔɨə̀ː gɨ̀ː tʰɑ̀ː jiáː .
c1-s277.tupa: sryoq jyq pyet pyenh sruoh qyo gy tha jiaeq

c1-s279.ipa: ʂɨə́ː jɨ́ː pịet ŋɨə̀n ŋɨə́ː ʔɨə̀ː gɨ̀ː tʰɑ̀ː jiáː .
c1-s279.tupa: sryoq jyq pyet ngyon ngyoq qyo gy tha jiaeq

c1-s281.ipa: pʉùː nə̀ŋ pịet gièː ŋịěː jiáː .
c1-s281.tupa: pu neong pyet gie ngyeh jiaeq

c1-s287.ipa: ʦʰiéː jʷìː kʷɑ̀n ʨiáː ꭦɨə̌ː jiáː .
c1-s287.tupa: tshieq jwi kwan tjiaeq dzryoh jiaeq

c1-s288.ipa: mʉòː ʨɨ̀ː mʉòː són ʔɨə̀ː ŋịěː .
c1-s288.tupa: muo tjy muo sonq qyo ngyeh

c1-s289.ipa: kǒː ʣèn liěj jiak kʰɑ́ː ɕɨə̀ː ɲɨɑk ʥiéː .
c1-s289.tupa: koh dzen liejh jiaek khaq sjyo njyak djieq

c1-s290.source: 吾有一數曰三名之曰「甲」為是「甲」遍吾有一言曰『問天地好在』書之云云
c1-s290.ipa: ŋòː ɦʉúː ʔit ʂʉǒː ɦʉot sɑ̀m miàŋ ʨɨ̀ː ɦʉot kạp ɦỵèː ʥiéː kạp pěn ŋòː ɦʉúː ʔit ŋɨə̀n ɦʉot mʉ̌n tʰèn dǐː hɑ́w ʣə́j ɕɨə̀ː ʨɨ̀ː ɦʉ̀n ɦʉ̀n .
c1-s290.tupa: ngo uq qit sruoh uot sam miaeng tjy uot kaep ue djieq kaep penh ngo uq qit ngyon uot munh then dih hawq dzeojq sjyo tjy un un

c1-s291.ipa: mʉ̌n tʰèn dǐː hɑ́w ʣə́j ʨɨ̀ː liěj .
c1-s291.tupa: munh then dih hawq dzeojq tjy liejh
